plot: A bunch of people, animals and sweets are willing to spend their holidays in America. But during the trip, a mystery awaits them.
title: El Misterio Del Gusano
plot_es: A bunch of people, animals and sweets are willing to spend their holidays in America. But during the trip, a mystery awaits them.
plot_en: A bunch of people, animals and sweets are willing to spend their holidays in America. But during the trip, a mystery awaits them.
